typeOne.definition: A person who does not experience sexual attraction to others.

typeTwo.definition: A person who does not experience romantic attraction to others.

typeThree.definition: A person who identifies as neither male nor female, or as neutral in terms of gender.

typeOne.definition: A person who does not adhere to traditional gender roles and may have a mix of masculine and feminine characteristics.

typeTwo.definition: A person who does not adhere to traditional romantic roles based on gender.

typeThree.definition: A person whose gender identity is a blend of male and female characteristics, or is indeterminate.

typeOne.definition: A person who experiences sexual attraction to others without regard to gender, or to multiple genders.

typeTwo.definition: A person who experiences romantic attraction to others without regard to gender, or to multiple genders.

typeThree.definition: A person who identifies as having two distinct gender identities, either simultaneously or alternately.

typeOne.definition: A person who experiences sexual attraction only after forming a deep emotional bond with someone.

typeTwo.definition: A person who experiences romantic attraction only after forming a deep emotional bond with someone.

typeOne.definition: A person who is primarily attracted to people of the same gender.

typeTwo.definition: A person who is primarily romantically attracted to people of the same gender.

typeOne.definition: A person whose sexual attraction fluctuates between genders or is fluid over time.

typeTwo.definition: A person whose romantic attraction fluctuates between genders or is fluid over time.

typeThree.definition: A person whose gender identity fluctuates between different genders or is fluid over time.

typeOne.definition: A woman who is primarily attracted to other women.

typeTwo.definition: A woman who is primarily romantically attracted to other women.

typeOne.definition: A person who is attracted to people of all gender identities.

typeTwo.definition: A person who is romantically attracted to people of all gender identities.

typeThree.definition: A person who may identify with any gender or no gender.

typeOne.definition: A person who is attracted to multiple genders, but not necessarily all genders.

typeTwo.definition: A person who is romantically attracted to multiple genders, but not necessarily all genders.

typeThree.definition: A person who may identify with multiple genders.

typeOne.definition: A term used by some individuals to describe their sexual orientation or gender identity in a way that does not conform to societal norms.

typeTwo.definition: A term used by some individuals to describe their romantic orientation in a way that does not conform to societal norms.

typeThree.definition: A term used by some individuals to describe their gender identity in a way that does not conform to societal norms.

typeOne.definition: A person who has undergone medical treatments to change their physical sex characteristics to align with their gender identity.

typeThree.definition: A person whose gender identity differs from the sex they were assigned at birth.
A term used by some Indigenous North American cultures to describe a person who embodies both masculine and feminine qualities, often possessing a spiritual role.
